attributes.action:
Instruct parliament to conduct a general election
Forthwith.
attributes.additional_details:
The current MPs no longer represent the constituent 
They were voted in on manifestos to honour the referendum result
In short they lied 
We need a general election now
attributes.background:
Parliament is no longer fit for purpose 
The constitution has been wrecked by the present MPs 
They have no honour dignity of integrity
The people must have the choice to vote a new MPs and a new government
